experience.title: Clinical Data Reporting Framework Developer
experience.description: Developed a flexible reporting framework for healthcare institutions to analyze clinical data effectively, improving actionable insights and patient care services by 10%.

experience.title: Data Warehouse Specialist at Cigna
experience.description: Led a team in migrating 10 petabyte terabytes of PHI and PII data from Oracle databases to Hadoop clusters using Sqoop and Flume, enhancing data security and compliance. Developed and optimized over 500 hive/impala queries, which improved reporting performance by 30%. Automated data workflows with Unix scripting, which increased department efficiency by 25%.
